fortbildungshistorie_footer_note: The points displayed are based on the interface with the training platform. Your complete documentation can be found in the official ÖZÄK training account.
login_register_title: Not yet registered with the Austrian Dental Chamber?
login_register_description: If you are new to practicing in Austria and do not yet have an entry with the Austrian Dental Chamber, you can apply for an entry here.
login_footer_copyright: © 2025 Austrian Dental Chamber. All rights reserved.
login_error_description: The email or password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
register_page_main_title: Registration with the Austrian Dental Chamber
register_step1_subtitle: Please create an account first to continue with the registration.
register_step1_card_description: Please provide a valid email address to secure your account and receive important communications.
register_email_exists_description: This email address is already in use. Please use a different email or try logging in.
register_email_valid_description: Email address is valid and available. Proceeding to the next step.
register_email_check_error_description: Could not verify email address. Please try again.
register_step1_part2_card_description: Please choose a secure password for your access to the member portal.
register_step1_part2_password_saved_desc: Password has been temporarily saved. Proceed to the next step.
register_step2_subtitle: Please fill in your personal data to continue.
register_step2_card_description: For registration with the Dental Chamber, we require complete and correct information. All fields marked with * are mandatory. Please also have your training certificates and professional qualifications ready.
register_step2_missing_data_desc: Essential information from previous steps is missing. Please start the registration process over.
register_step2_data_saved_desc: Your personal information has been temporarily saved. Proceed to the next step.
register_step4_card_description: For registration with the Dental Chamber, we need complete and correct information. All fields marked with * are mandatory. Please have your training certificates and professional qualifications ready.
register_step4_data_saved_desc: Your professional qualifications have been temporarily saved. Proceed to the next step.
register_step5_contract_bvaeb: BVAEB (Insurance Institution for Public Employees, Railways and Mining)
register_step5_contract_kfa: KFA (Health Insurance Fund for Municipal Employees)
register_step5_data_saved_desc: Your practice information has been temporarily saved. Proceed to the next step.
register_step6_subtitle: Please review your data before submission.
register_step6_card_description: Please verify your information carefully before submitting your application.
register_step6_info_message: Your application will be reviewed by the Dental Chamber. You will receive an email with your Dentist ID upon successful review.
register_step6_terms_checkbox_text_part1: I confirm the accuracy of my details and agree to the processing of my data according to the
register_step6_terms_error_desc: You must agree to the terms and privacy policy to submit your application.
register_step6_success_desc: Your application has been successfully submitted for review. You will be contacted via email.
register_step6_submit_error_desc: An error occurred while submitting your application. Please review your data and try again. If the problem persists, contact support.
register_success_card_message_line1: Your application has been successfully submitted to the Dental Chamber Salzburg.
register_success_card_message_line2: After review, you will receive your dentist ID and further information via email.
dashboard_chamber_office_hours:
Mon-Thu: 8:00 AM - 4:30 PM
Fri: 8:00 AM - 2:00 PM
dashboard_confirm_reps_description: Here you can confirm representations where you were represented.
settings_page_description: Manage your account settings and set e-mail preferences.
settings_personal_data_desc: Update your personal details and contact information.
settings_prof_qual_desc: Manage your professional titles, specializations, and qualifications.
settings_practice_info_desc: Update the details for your primary practice or clinic.
settings_save_error_desc: Could not save your changes. Please try again.
settings_personal_data_success_desc: Your personal data has been successfully updated.
settings_prof_qual_success_desc: Your professional qualifications have been successfully updated.
settings_practice_info_success_desc: Your practice information has been successfully updated.
settings_danger_zone_desc: This action is permanent and cannot be undone.
settings_delete_dialog_desc_part1: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove all your data from our servers, including all uploaded documents.
settings_delete_error_code_mismatch_desc: The confirmation code does not match.
settings_delete_success_desc: Your account has been permanently deleted.
